name: Galaxy's Labyrinth
description:
This small dark and creepy space station will have you never wanting to go back. But, it's not dark you say? Why don't you try out the arcade game GalaXa in front of you, I hear it's killer fun.

If you want to win, you'll have to figure a way out.

Programming and Art by StoreboughtRocketGames

Music by Spaghooots

Controls:

Left-click - Interact with arcade (Also shoot)

Right-click - Interact with objects
